Description of incident: A laptop belonging to an Oregon National Guard member was stolen and the military is contacting service members who might be affected by the theft. According to the Oregon National Guard, the laptop was stolen from a vehicle. The Guard member had been using the laptop to conduct work from home. Although this laptop is password protected, there is still potential for exposure of individual personal information. UPDATE (7/1/10): The 3,500 National Guard members who were affected have been notified.
